answers.answer: Hmmm have they checked you for diabetes, bad sugar levels can cause numbness and seizures. Have you had brain scans etc??? Demand every test under the sun!!!!

Yea my numbness is all the time. And now my muscles in my arms feel like they are disappearing

question: I'm 24 weeks with my daughter and since around 18 weeks I began having numbness in all my limbs and seizures.doctors can't figure it out because until then everything was ok.
